typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Region as string,
		Country as string,
		{Item Type} as string,
		{Sales Channel} as string,
		{Order Priority} as string,
		{Order Date} as string,
		{Order ID} as string,
		{Ship Date} as string,
		{Units Sold} as string,
		{Unit Price} as string,
		{Unit Cost} as string,
		{Total Revenue} as string,
		{Total Cost} as string,
		{Total Profit} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sales
sales split({Item Type}=='Household',
	{Item Type}=='Fruits',
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(home, fruit, other)
ConditionalSplit1@home select(mapColumn(
		Region,
		Country,
		{Item Type},
		{Sales Channel},
		{Order Priority},
		{Order Date},
		{Order ID},
		{Ship Date},
		{Units Sold},
		{Unit Price},
		{Unit Cost},
		{Total Revenue},
		{Total Cost},
		{Total Profit}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
ConditionalSplit1@fruit derive(Newcol = concat({Item Type},{Sales Channel})) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 derive(Country = upper(Country)) ~> ModifyColumns1
ModifyColumns1 derive(Country = trim(Country)) ~> ModifyColumns2
Select1 sink(input(
		orderId as string,
		orderTotal as string,
		itemName as string,
		itemQty as string,
		name as string,
		location as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['condition1.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
ModifyColumns2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Region,
		Country,
		{Item Type},
		{Sales Channel},
		{Order Priority},
		{Order Date},
		{Order ID},
		{Ship Date},
		{Units Sold},
		{Unit Price},
		{Unit Cost},
		{Total Revenue},
		{Total Cost},
		{Total Profit},
		ConcatCol = Newcol
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
ConditionalSplit1@other sink(input(
		orderId as string,
		orderTotal as string,
		itemName as string,
		itemQty as string,
		name as string,
		location as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['condition2.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink3
